title: XP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the PSBC game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with 250 XP on the bottom left corner of the card

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the PSBC
AND is final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user gets 250 XP

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the result feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user DO NOT see PSBC result card

title: Token
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the PSBC game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with 5 tokens on the bottom left corner of the card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made correct picks in Wild Card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives 5 tokens for each correct pick (max: 20)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made correct picks in Division Series
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives 15 tokens for each correct pick (max: 60)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made correct picks in League Championship
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives 20 tokens for each correct pick (max: 40)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made correct picks in World Series
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives 40 tokens for each correct pick (max: 40)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user correctly predicts all bracket
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user received 200 tokens

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the result feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user DO NOT see HRD result card ???

title: Reward Pack
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user plays the PSBC

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user submits their PSBC picks
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user received the rare Reward Pack after submission (1Rare, 2 Common)
AND this is independent of any virtual rewards earned through Tokens.
AND this is only for the first submission per unique user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the reward Pack (in the feed)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy for the Feed event should read: “You unlocked a Rewards Pack for your Postseason Bracket Challenge submission!”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user updates their picks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user does NOT receive another Reward Pack

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's region is set to US
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the PSBC game card for US

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's region is set to any other region (besides Canada)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the PSBC game card for US

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's region is set to Canada
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the PSBC game card for Canada

title: PSBC Game Card position - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Games tab on the PSBC launch date (October 5)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the PSBC game card has the topmost position 
AND the game card is unlocked

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the PSBC card at the start of the first game (October 7)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN PSBC card is locked (not grayscale) 
AND the card is moved to position #

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Games tab after World Series
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the PSBC game card is grayed out

title: Game Card - unlocked state - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in 
AND user is on the Game tab
AND PSBC has unlocked state (scheduled)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the HRD card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with

* Postseason Bracket Challenge logo in the center
* 250 XP on the bottom left corner
* 5 token on the bottom left corner next to XP
* background image

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the PSBC tutorial page or bracket (if played already)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user submits their picks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the PSBC game card has a check mark

title: Game Card - locked state - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user is on the Game tab
AND PSBC has a locked state (live or final)
custom_expected: THEN user should display with PSBC game card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the PSBC card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with

* Postseason Bracket Challenge logo in the center
* 250 XP on the bottom left corner
* 5 token on the bottom left corner next to XP
* background image
* lock icon is displayed in the top right corner

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the tutorial page (double check - could be bracket)

title: Copy for correctly predicted matchup - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played the PSBC
AND user made a correct prediction

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made a correct prediction on the Wild Card/Division Series
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user gets the user event: 
You got a [Round Name] prediction correct! [Team name] won!

Example: You got a Division Series prediction correct! The New York Yankees won!

AND user receives 0 XP and # RP

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made a correct prediction on the League Championship Series
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user gets the user event: 
You correctly predicted the [ALCS/NLCS]! [Team name] won!
AND user receives 0 XP and 20 RP

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made a correct prediction on the World Series
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user gets the user event: 
You correctly predicted the World Series! [Team name] won!
AND user receives 250 XP and 40 RP

title: Copy for incorrectly predicted matchup - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played the PSBC
AND user made an incorrect prediction

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made a incorrect prediction on the Wild Card/Division Series
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user gets the user event: 
You guessed a [Round Name] matchup incorrectly. You chose [User Team], but [Correct Team] won.

AND user receives 0 XP and 0 RP

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made a incorrect prediction on the League Championship Series
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user gets the user event: 
You guessed the [ALCS/NLCS] incorrectly. You chose [User Team], but [Correct Team] won.
AND user receives 0 XP and 0 RP

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made a incorrect prediction on the World Series
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user gets the user event: 
You guessed the World Series incorrectly. You chose [User Team], but [Correct Team] won.
AND user receives 250 XP and # RP

title: Season Champion: Postseason Bracket - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played PSBC
AND HRD is final
custom_expected: All received badges should be displayed in Feed and user's profile page under Badges section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scores the maximum points in the Postseason Bracket Challenge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives the Season Champion: Postseason Bracket badge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the badge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say  'Score the maximum points in the Postseason Bracket Challenge (perfect game criteria AND correctly predicting the number of games played in the WS)'

title: Perfect Game: Postseason Bracket - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played PSBC
AND HRD is final
custom_expected: All received badges should be displayed in Feed and user's profile page under Badges section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user correctly predicts every Postseason winner
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives the Perfect Game: Postseason Bracket

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the badge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say  'Correctly predict every Postseason winner'

title: Matchup Master - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played PSBC
AND HRD is final
custom_expected: All received badges should be displayed in Feed and user's profile page under Badges section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user correctly predicts the winner of a Postseason series
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives the Matchup Master badge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the badge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say  'Correctly predict the winner of a Postseason series'

title: Know November - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played PSBC
AND HRD is final
custom_expected: All received badges should be displayed in Feed and user's profile page under Badges section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user correctly predicts the MLB World Series Winner
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives the Know November badge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the badge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say  'Correctly predict the MLB World Series winner'

title: Brackets UI - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing brackets
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* team name 
* team logo

AND the correct team logos are displayed
AND team name are displayed fully (no truncation)

title: Making a pick flow - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Postseason Bracket Challenge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the PSBC card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the bracket tutorial page (webview) - separate tc

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks 'Enter Bracket'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with a bracket

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects the team from the first matchup
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN selected team changes the accent color to blue
AND selected team moves to next round

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selected team in the final matchup
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the team name, appears on the right side
AND 'Submit My Picks' button gets enabled

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Submit My Picks' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tiebreaker page is displayed (separate TC)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user answers the tiebreaker questions
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user can submit their picks

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Submit My Picks' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's picks are submitted 
AND user receives a submission email (separate tc)
AND user is awarded with rare Reward Pack

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user reopens the PSBC card after submitting picks
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the tutorial page is not displayed 
AND user can see their picks

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user submits their pick
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the PSBC game card has a check mark

title: Submitting flow - user is logged in - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Postseason Bracket Challenge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user submits their picks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is not asked to log in

title: Submitting flow - user is not logged in - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Postseason Bracket Challenge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user submits their picks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is asked to log in

title: Tiebreaker page - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Postseason Bracket Challenge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made picks and clicked on 'Submit My Picks' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with Tiebreaker page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Tiebreaker page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* 'Required Questions' section - required
* 'Tiebreaker Questions' section - non required
* DOB field (if user is not logged in) - separate TC
* section with 2 check fields

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters input in the fields
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN fields only accept numeric and letters and no special characters

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters valid input
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is able to submit picks 
AND 'Submit My Picks' button is enabled

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN required fields have no input
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is not able to proceed and 'Submit My Picks' button is disabled
AND 'Please answer all required questions*' pop up is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the first question
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it should only accepts values 1-7

title: Tutorial page - to update!
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing HRD

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the HRD bracket before submitting any picks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tutorial page is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the tutorial page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with
* Home Run Derby image
* title: Pick the perfect T-Mobile Home Run Derby® bracket and compete to win $100,000!
* copy: 
You can edit your selections until 5 minutes before the Home Run Derby begins on July 18. (with correct date!)
* legal copy
* 'Enter Bracket' button

Note: no mlb.com link should be displayed

MATCH with previous

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on Official Rules
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN 2022 T-Mobile Home Run Derby Bracket Challenge webpage is open
https://www.mlb.com/brackets/home-run-derby/rules

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Enter Bracket' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with bracket

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks outside the 'Enter Bracket' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user stays on tutorial page (currently a bug)

title: Submission email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing PSBC

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user submits the picks
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user receives an email
AND submission email has correct dates and logo
AND all links redirect to correct pages

title: Changing picks flow - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played PSBC
AND all games are live (not locked)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the PSBC bracket
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the their picks

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user updated the pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the selected batter changes the accent color to blue
AND selected batter is updated in the next round
AND the next round selection is removed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made new picks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 'Submit My Picks' button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user submits the picks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives another submission email

title: DOB field - logged in user - 18yo - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is 18yo and onlder
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing PSBC
AND user is on Tiebreaker page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN clicks submit button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user's picks are successfully submitted

title: DOB field - logged in user - under 18yo - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is under 18 yo
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing PSBC
AND user is on Tiebreaker page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN clicks submit button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is not able to submit their picks and 'Sorry! You are not eligible to play the brackets' pop up is displayed.

title: DOB field - user has no DOB in their account - updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing PSBC
AND user is on Tiebreaker page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the submitting page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees the DOB section
AND DOB section is required

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters the  DOB which is >18
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is able to submit their picks 
AND user's DOB is updated in mlb.com account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters DOB which is under 18
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is not able to submit their picks and 'Sorry! You are not eligible to play the brackets' pop up is displayed.

title: Bracket is locked - user played
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user made HRD picks

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the HRD game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the HRD card has a lock icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on HRD game card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with the bracket
AND user can see their picks
AND user is not able to update the picks
AND 'Submit Picks' button is not there
AND user is displayed with the modal 'The bracket contest is now locked. Check back soon to see the results!'

title: Bracket is locked - user didn't play
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user didn't play

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the HRD game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the HRD game card has a lock icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on HRD game card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with the bracket
AND bracket has no picks
AND user is not able to make picks
AND 'Submit Picks' button is not there
AND user is displayed with the modal 'The bracket contest is now locked. Check back soon to see the results!'

title: Matchup is final
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played HRD

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the matchup is final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the scores are displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made correct pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the matchup card has a checkmark with green background (on the left)
AND selected batters name is displayed in the the next matchup above position 1 or below position 2 and is not crossed (in green)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made incorrect pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the matchup card has a 'X' with red background (on the left)
AND selected batters name is displayed in the the next matchup above position 1 or below position 2 and is crossed (in red)
AND batters name who won the matchup is displayed in the next round

title: Round is final
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played HRD

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the whole round is final
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN all matchups have the final score
AND the 'final' tag is displayed under the Round header

title: All rounds are final - user played
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user played HRD 
AND the game is final

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the bracket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees

* all matchups have scores
* all rounds have 'final' title
* the winner section displays the winner with the headshot, name and team name
* no CTA button is displayed

AND user is able to see their picks results (Matchup is final tc)

title: All rounds are final - user didn't play
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user play didn't play HRD
AND the game is final

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the b bracket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees

* all matchups have scores
* all rounds have 'final' title
* the winner section displays the winner with the headshot, name and team name
* no CTA button is displayed

title: Devices are in sync
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the game on mobile device
AND then opens the HRD on web
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees their previous submissions

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the game on web
AND the opens the HRD on mobile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees their previous submissions

title: MLB Play and mlb.com integration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user submits their pick
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user can successfully submit their picks without asking to log in

title: Account data integration
custom_preconds: GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is logged in
AND user has no DOB on their mlb.com account
AND user submits their pick
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is prompt with login page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters their DOB
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the DOB is saved in mlb.com

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is logged in
AND user enters bracket page for the first time
AND user submits their pick
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is prompt is asked to enter DOB when submitting picks

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters DOB that doesn't match their info in the mlb.com account
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN new DOB is saved in mlb.com
